Export.Routine:
VARMEDDispenseManPickLine
#include COMConst #include INConst #include COMGridEdit31 #include MEDConst #include VARConst #define YCR "|" #define FORMFldVARMEDDispenseManPickLineRxItem 1 Enabled(pYKEY,pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Called By : Form VARMEDDispenseMan : Grid Tab (COMGridEditParameter) ; ; ; History: ; 30-May-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnEnabled
set blnEnabled = $$$YES
if '$$$NoKey(pYKEY) {
if $$$MEDDispenseStatus(pYFELD) > 3 { ;"Partially Processed" set blnEnabled = $$$NO } }
quit blnEnabled
LoadLines(pYKEY,pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Called By : VARMEDDispenseMan.mac ; ; ; History: ; 28-Aug-2014 SCR HEVA-1592: Check for 'CEF' (FREE3) ; 07-Jul-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Corrected Unit selection ; 30-May-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new fltQtyReq,idCount,idItem,idLine,idLocn,idManOrd,idPPickUOM,idPat,idRx,idSrcDisp new idSrcLine,idStatusRx,idToLocn,idToStorage,objDispLine,objManOrd,objPickLine new objResultSet,objRxLine,objSrcDisp,objSrcLine,sc,strSQL,strStatus do ClearDispenseLines(pYKEY) if $data(^MEDDispensePickLine(YM,pYKEY)) { quit } set strStatus = $$$OK set idPat = $$$MEDDispensePatient(pYFELD) set idCount = 0 set strSQL = "" set strSQL = strSQL _ "SELECT MEDDispenseLine.Dispense as Dispensation,MEDDispenseLine.Line " set strSQL = strSQL _ "FROM MEDDispenseLine " set strSQL = strSQL _ "WHERE MEDDispenseLine.Company = 0 " set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.UDO = 1 " set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.ValidatedBy IS NOT NULL " set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.FREE3 IS NOT NULL "
;set strSQL = strSQL _ "LEFT JOIN MEDDispense ON MEDDispense.Company = MEDDispenseLine.Company AND MEDDispense.Dispensation = MEDDispenseLine.Dispense " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "LEFT JOIN MEDPrescription ON MEDPrescription.Company = MEDDispense.Company AND MEDPrescription.PrescriptionNumber = MEDDispense.Prescription " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "LEFT JOIN MEDPrescriptionLine ON MEDDispense.Company = MEDPrescriptionLine.Company " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispense.Prescription = MEDPrescriptionLine.PrescriptionNumber " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.Line = MEDPrescriptionLine.Line " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "LEFT JOIN INART ON MEDDispenseLine.Company = INART.Company AND MEDDispenseLine.ItemName = INART.ItemNumber " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "WHERE MEDDispenseLine.Company = 0 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.UDO = 1 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.ValidatedBy IS NOT NULL " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDDispenseLine.FREE3 IS NOT NULL "
;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDPrescriptionLine.Status != 10 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDPrescriptionLine.Status != 6 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDPrescriptionLine.Status != 9 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDPrescriptionLine.Status != 8 " ;set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND MEDPrescription.PatientID = ? "
set strSQL = strSQL _ "AND $$SQLGetPatientFromDisp^VARSQL(MEDDispenseLine.Dispense) = ? " set objResultSet = ##class(%Library.ResultSet).%New() set sc = objResultSet.Prepare(strSQL) set:sc sc = objResultSet.Execute(idPat) set idLine = 0 set idLocn = $$$MEDDispenseSupplyingLocation(pYFELD) set idToLocn = $$$MEDDispenseDestinationLocation(pYFELD) if sc { while objResultSet.Next() { quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) ;set idManOrd = objResultSet.Data("ManipulationOrder") set idSrcDisp = objResultSet.Data("Dispensation") set idSrcLine = objResultSet.Data("Line") set idManOrd = "" set objManOrd = "" set idToStorage = "" set objSrcDisp = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,idSrcDisp,1)) set objSrcLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,idSrcDisp,idSrcLine,1)) set idRx = $$$MEDDispensePrescription(objSrcDisp) set objRxLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,idRx,idSrcLine,1)) set idStatusRx = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineStatus(objRxLine) continue:idStatusRx=10 continue:idStatusRx=6 continue:idStatusRx=9 continue:idStatusRx=8 if (idSrcDisp'="")&&(idSrcLine'="") { set idManOrd=$order(^VARManipulacaoMagistrals(YM,1,$$$Index(idSrcDisp),$$$Index(idSrcLine),"")) if idManOrd'="" { set objManOrd=$get(^VARManipulacaoMagistral(YM,idManOrd,1)) } }
set objSrcDisp = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,idSrcDisp,1)) set objSrcLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,idSrcDisp,idSrcLine,1)) set objDispLine = objSrcLine set objPickLine = "" set idItem = $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralItem(objManOrd) ;set fltQtyReq = $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralQuantity(objManOrd) set idPPickUOM = $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralUnit(objManOrd) if (idToLocn'="")&&(idItem'="") { set idToStorage = $$GetStorage^INIssueAuto(idItem,idToLocn,,.idToStorage) } set $$$MEDDispensePickLinePickUOM(objPickLine) = idPPickUOM set $$$MEDDispensePickLineToStorage(objPickLine) = idToStorage set $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispense(objDispLine) = idSrcDisp set $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispenseLine(objDispLine) = idSrcLine set $$$MEDDispenseLineWorkOrder(objDispLine) = idManOrd set $$$MEDDispenseLineItemName(objDispLine) = idItem if idItem'="" { set objDispLine = $$UpdateDispenseLine^MEDDispenseCalc(idSrcDisp,idSrcLine,objDispLine) } set fltQtyReq = $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueQuantity(objDispLine) set $$$MEDDispensePickLineItem(objPickLine) = idItem set $$$MEDDispensePickLineRequestedQty(objPickLine) = fltQtyReq set idLine = idLine + 1 set strStatus = $$$Save("MEDDispenseLine",pYKEY_","_idLine,objDispLine,$$$YES) quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) set strStatus = $$$Save("MEDDispensePickLine",pYKEY_","_idLine,objPickLine,$$$YES) quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus) if idManOrd'="" { set $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispense(objManOrd) = pYKEY set $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispenseLine(objManOrd)= idLine set strStatus = $$$Save("VARManipulacaoMagistral",idManOrd,objManOrd,$$$YES) } quit:$$$ISERR(strStatus)
} }
quit ClearDispenseLines(pidDisp) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Clear Dispense Line if there is no Pick Line ; ; ; History: ; 12-June-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new arrLine,idLine,strStatus set idLine = "" for { set idLine = $order(^MEDDispensePickLine(YM,pidDisp,idLine)) quit:idLine="" set arrLine(idLine\1)="" } set idLine = "" for { set idLine = $order(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,pidDisp,idLine)) quit:idLine="" if '$data(arrLine(idLine)) { set strStatus = $$$Kill("MEDDispenseLine",pidDisp_","_idLine) } }
quit OnBeforeFormat(pYFIELDNAME,pobjLine) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; set the format ; ; Called By : ; Form - GridEdit:VARMEDDispenseManPickLine ; Routines - ; ; Inputs : ; pYFIELDNAME - Browser Element ID "tdY#row#_#col#" ; pobjLine - @nM INIssueLine Data record ; ; ByRef : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 20-Jan-2015 HGD HEVA1694: Modified the DoseQty to show "0,56" instead ".56" on Dosage Field ; 05-Sep-2014 SCR HEVA1505: Added Item locking ; 02-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new arrLines,blnOK,idBundle,idClassField,idFreq,idItem,idLine,idManDisp,idManLine new idRx,idRxItem,intCol,intRow,objBundle,objDisp,objDispLine,objManDisp,objManDispLine new objRxLine
quit:YKEY=""
; Grid Position ;--------------------------------------- $$$GRIDSplitKey(pYFIELDNAME,intRow,intCol) set idClassField = $$$GetClassField(YFORM,intCol)
set blnOK = $$GetVars(YKEY,.idManDisp,.idManLine,.objManDisp,.objManDispLine,.objDisp,.objDispLine,.idRx,.objRxLine,.idRxItem)
quit:'blnOK
if (intCol = 1) { set YTEXT = "("_idRxItem_") "_$$^INARTNAME(idRxItem) set YTOOLTIP = $$$Text($listbuild("VAR8897",idRx)) ;Prescription } if (intCol = 2) { ;set YTEXT = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseQty(objRxLine)_" "_$$$AppEnum("EINHEIT", $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objRxLine)) set YTEXT = $$^WWWTR(0,12,$$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseQty(objRxLine))_" "_$$$AppEnum("EINHEIT", $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseUOM(objRxLine)) } if (intCol = 3) { set idFreq = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineFrequency(objRxLine) quit:idFreq="" set YTEXT = $$$MEDFrequencyFrequency($get(^MEDFrequency(YM,idFreq,1))) } if (intCol = 4) { set idItem = $$$MEDDispensePickLineItem(pobjLine) if idItem'="" { set YTEXT = "("_idItem_") "_$$^INARTNAME(idItem) } set idDisp = $$$KEY1(YKEY) set idLine = $$$KEY2(YKEY) if idLine'=(idLine\1) { set YENABLED = $$$NO ; Sub Lines can not have the item changed set YTOOLTIP = $$$Text($listbuild("VAR8900")) ;Item can not be changed when it is a Sub Line } else { do GetGridContents^COMGridEdit31G(.arrLines,"VARMEDDispenseManPickLine") set idNextLine = $order(arrLines(idDisp,idLine)) if idNextLine\1=idLine { set YENABLED = $$$NO ; If the Line has sub lines the item can not be changed set YTOOLTIP = $$$Text($listbuild("VAR8901")) ;Item can not be changed if it has Sub Lines } } } if (intCol = 6) { } if (intCol = 7) { set idBundle = $$$MEDDispensePickLineBundle(pobjLine) if idBundle'="" { set objBundle = ##class(alSOH.dBundle).%OpenId(idBundle) set YTEXT = ##class(alSOH.iUSOH).RenderBundle(objBundle,SPRACHE) } } quit
GetVars(YKEY,&pidManDisp,&pidManLine,&pobjManDisp,&pobjManDispLine,&pobjDisp,&pobjDispLine,&pidRx,&pobjRxLine,&pidRxItem) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Get Vars ; ; ; History : ; 02-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,pidDisp,pidDispLine,pidRxLine set blnOK = $$$YES set pidManDisp = $translate($$$KEY1(YKEY),"""","") set pidManLine = $$$KEY2(YKEY) set:pidManLine="" blnOK = $$$NO if $$$ISOK(blnOK) { set pobjManDisp = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,pidManDisp,1)) set pobjManDispLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,pidManDisp,pidManLine\1,1)) set pidDisp = $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispense(pobjManDispLine) set pidDispLine = $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispenseLine(pobjManDispLine) set:pidDispLine="" blnOK = $$$NO } if $$$ISOK(blnOK) { set pobjDisp = $get(^MEDDispense(YM,pidDisp,1)) set pobjDispLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,pidDisp,pidDispLine,1)) set pidRxLine = pidDispLine set pidRx = $$$MEDDispensePrescription(pobjDisp) set:pidRx="" blnOK = $$$NO } if $$$ISOK(blnOK) { set pobjRxLine = $get(^MEDPrescriptionLine(YM,pidRx,pidRxLine,1)) set pidRxItem = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineItem(pobjRxLine) } quit blnOK
OnBeforeFormatClass(pYFIELDNAME,pobjLine) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Called from class hook via MEDDispensePickLine.mac ; ; ; Inputs : ; pYFIELDNAME - Browser Element ID "tdY#row#_#col#" ; pYFELD - @nM INIssueLine Data record ; ; ByRef : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; ; 09-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idClassField,intCol,intRow,objHeader
$$$GRIDSplitKey(pYFIELDNAME,intRow,intCol) set idClassField = $$$GetClassField(YFORM,intCol)
set objHeader = $$$GRIDYFELDContainer
quit
OnBeforeDisplayLine(pYKEY,pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Code to run on before display line for a line in the grid ; ; Params: pYKEY,pYFELD : The YKEY/YFELD values ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 03-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,idManDisp,idManLine,idRx,idRxItem,objDisp,objDispLine,objManDisp new objManDispLine,objRxLine set blnOK = $$GetVars(pYKEY,.idManDisp,.idManLine,.objManDisp,.objManDispLine,.objDisp,.objDispLine,.idRx,.objRxLine,.idRxItem) quit:'blnOK ; Sets PITEM
set PITEM = idRxItem quit 1
QtyOK(pYKEY,pfltPickQty) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check the Qty ; ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 06-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,fltDoseQty,fltRxQty,idManDisp,idManLine,idRx,idRxItem,intDoses,objDisp new objDispLine,objManDisp,objManDispLine,objRxLine,objTestLine
do GetVars(pYKEY,.idManDisp,.idManLine,.objManDisp,.objManDispLine,.objDisp,.objDispLine,.idRx,.objRxLine,.idRxItem) set objTestLine = $$UpdateDispenseLine^MEDDispenseCalc(idManDisp,idManLine,objManDispLine,$$$YES,,.intDoses,.fltDoseQty) set fltRxQty = $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueQuantity(objTestLine) if $$MultidoseInjectable^INART(idRxItem) { set fltRxQty = fltRxQty+.999999\1 } if (pfltPickQty> fltRxQty ) { set blnOK = $$$NO } else { set blnOK = $$$YES } quit blnOK
OnBlurItem(pYKEY, pidGridRow, pidItem, &pobjLine) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; On Blur from Item ; Update Dyna Table ; ; ; History : ; ; 06-Jun-2014 SCR HEAV-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,fltQty,idDispUOM,idItem,idManDisp,idManLine,idRx,idRxItem,idSrcDisp new idSrcLine,idUnit,objDisp,objDispLine,objLine,objManDisp,objManDispLine new objRxLine,strStatus set blnOK = $$GetVars(pYKEY,.idManDisp,.idManLine,.objManDisp,.objManDispLine,.objDisp,.objDispLine,.idRx,.objRxLine,.idRxItem) quit:'blnOK quit:pidItem="" set idItem = $$$MEDDispenseLineItemName(pobjLine) set:idItem="" idItem = pidItem set $$$MEDDispenseLineItemName(objManDispLine)=idItem set idUnit = $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueUOM(objManDispLine) set idRx = $$$MEDDispensePrescription(objDisp) if (idUnit'="") { if '$data(^INARTPACK(YM,idItem,idUnit)) { set idUnit = "" set $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueUOM(objLine)=idUnit } } set idSrcDisp = $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispense(objManDispLine) set idSrcLine = $$$MEDDispenseLineUDODispenseLine(objManDispLine) set objManDispLine=$$UpdateDispenseLine^MEDDispenseCalc(idSrcDisp,idSrcLine,objManDispLine) set idDispUOM = $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueUOM(objManDispLine) set fltQty = $$$MEDDispenseLineIssueQuantity(objManDispLine) set $$$MEDDispensePickLineRequestedQty(pobjLine)= fltQty set $$$MEDDispensePickLinePickUOM(pobjLine) = idDispUOM set strStatus = $$$Save("MEDDispenseLine",idManDisp_","_idManLine,objManDispLine,$$$YES) write "DrawDynTable_GridFieldFocus("_pidGridRow_");" quit
OnBeforeSave(pYKEY,&pYFELD) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; OnBeforeSave of the MEDDispenseLine ; ; History : ; ; 06-Jun-2014 SCR HEAV-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set $$$MEDDispensePickLineIssueQty(pYFELD) = $$$MEDDispensePickLinePickQty(pYFELD) quit
OnBeforeDelete(pYKEY,pblnDoAll=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Called By : WWW001VARHooks form VARMEDDispenseManPickLine on OnBeforeDelete or VARMEDDispenseMan.mac ; ; ; History: ; 26-Jun-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,idDisp,idLine,idOrder,idPick,idScan,objLine,objOrder,strStatus
set idDisp = $$$KEY1(pYKEY) set idPick = $$$KEY2(pYKEY) set idLine = idPick\1 if (idDisp'="") && (idLine'="") { set blnOK=$$$YES set idScan = "" for { set idScan = $order(^MEDDispensePickLine(YM,idDisp,idScan)) quit:idScan="" continue:idScan\1'=idLine continue:idScan=idPick set blnOK = $$$NO } if blnOK||pblnDoAll { set objLine = $get(^MEDDispenseLine(YM,idDisp,idLine,1)) set idOrder = $$$MEDDispenseLineWorkOrder(objLine) if idOrder'="" { set objOrder = $get(^VARManipulacaoMagistral(YM,idOrder,1)) if ($$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispense(objOrder)=idDisp)&& ($$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispenseLine(objOrder)=idLine) { set $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispense(objOrder) = "" set $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralManDispenseLine(objOrder) = "" set strStatus = $$$Save("VARManipulacaoMagistral",idOrder,objOrder,1) } set strStatus = $$$Kill("MEDDispenseLine",idDisp_$$$COMMA_idLine) } } } quit $$$OK
OnBeforeDisplayCombo(pstrKeys,pobjLine,pintCol,&pSUCH) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Set 'PITEM' for Alternative Items drop down ; ; set pSUCH as the items to be used when you override the list (set via blnOverride) ; ; Inputs: ; pstrKeys - YKEY ; pobjLine - YFELD ; pintCol - Edit Grid Column Id ; pSUCH - Search Array ; ; Returns: $$$YES or $$$NO (override the data) ; ; History: ; 31-Jul-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnOK,blnOverride,fltReqDose,idItem,idMan,idManDisp,idManLine,idRx,idRxItem new idxItem,objDisp,objDispLine,objMan,objManDisp,objManDispLine,objRxLine
set blnOverride = $$$NO ; Sets PITEM ; F11 - Received Unit ;--------------------------------------- if pintCol = 4 { set blnOK = $$GetVars(pstrKeys,.idManDisp,.idManLine,.objManDisp,.objManDispLine,.objDisp,.objDispLine,.idRx,.objRxLine,.idRxItem) set PITEM = idRxItem kill pSUCH set pSUCH = "SUCH" set blnOverride = $$$YES if idRxItem '= "" { set idItem = "" for { set idItem = $order(^INARTA(0,idRxItem,idItem)) quit:idItem="" set fltReqDose = $$$MEDPrescriptionLineDoseQty(objRxLine) if $$ItemOK(idRxItem,idItem,fltReqDose) { set pSUCH(idItem) = idItem } } } } quit blnOverride
ItemOK(pidRxItem,pidItem,pfltReqDose) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Check the Alternative Item is OK to use ; ; ; History: ; 12-Jan-2015 HEVA:1689 ; 14-Aug-2014 SCR HEVA-1505: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnMag,blnOK,idMan,idxItem,objAlt,objMan set blnOK = $$$NO set blnMag = $$$NO set idMan = "" set idxItem = $$$Index(pidItem) for { set idMan = $order(^VARManipulacaoMagistrals(YM,3,idxItem,idMan)) quit:idMan="" set blnMag = $$$YES set objMan = $get(^VARManipulacaoMagistral(YM,idMan,1)) if $$$VARManipulacaoMagistralConcentrationQuantity(objMan) = pfltReqDose { set blnOK = $$$YES } } if ('blnMag) { set objAlt = $get(^INARTA(0,pidRxItem,pidItem,1)) //if $$$INARTAConversion(objAlt) = 1 { *HEVA-1689 regra desnecessária if $$$INARTAType(objAlt) = 3 { set blnOK = $$$YES } //} } quit blnOK
